title: Adoption of Herefordshire Local Plan Core Strategy (Herefordshire County Council)
text: ( Source : Herefordshire County Council ) After many years in preparation the Herefordshire Local Plan , which will act as the cornerstone for planning and development in the county, is now adopted. An extraordinary council meeting on 16
